document_checklist: SLC Transcript / Pass Certificate / Character Certificate
Bachelor’s Transcript / Provisional / Pass Certificate / Character Certificate (For Master only)
Experience Letter (For MBA – 2 years of exp. is mandatory - Managerial Level)
Marriage Certificate (for dependent – available only for Master Course)
cas_documents: Amount must not be below the required balance during the UKVI required period
Details must be in the student’s or parent’s name
Total amount = Tuition Fees + Living Cost OR Educational Loan – In student’s name only
Loan offer letter and sanction paper (include exchange rate, disbursement conditions)
Consent letter from parents if bank statement in parent’s name
TB Report – Only from IOM / Norvic
visa_documents: Proof of Visa Fee / Application Fee Payment
All Academic Documents (10th, 12th, Bachelors for Master)
Consent Letter and Birth Certificate if under 18
